HELPER_TEXT.OBJECTIVE_GENERAL: An Objective is a description of a goal to be achieved in the future.
HELPER_TEXT.OBJECTIVE_TITLE:
Create an ambitious title that best describes your goal.

The title should not contain any metric

eg.
  • Generate more revenue than last year
  • Become market leader
  • Increase website engagement
HELPER_TEXT.OBJECTIVE_DESCRIPTION: Write a short description to give some context to your Objective
HELPER_TEXT.OBJECTIVE_LEVEL: The group to which this Objective belongs to.
HELPER_TEXT.OBJECTIVE_OWNER: The group/ individual responsible for completing the Objective.
HELPER_TEXT.OBJECTIVE_LEAD: The person responsible for organizing and planning that is needed to achieve the Objective.
HELPER_TEXT.OBJECTIVE_TIMEFRAME: Time Frame for which this Objective is created. If a time frame doesn't exist, create one here.
HELPER_TEXT.KPI_GENERAL: Organizations use Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to evaluate their success at reaching targets. KPIs can be used as measurable metrics for Key results.
HELPER_TEXT.KPI_NAME:
Name your new KPI

Examples for good KPI title

  • # of Followers
  • Annual Recurring Revenue
  • Customer Lifetime Value
HELPER_TEXT.KPI_DESCRIPTION: Write a short description to give some context to your KPI
HELPER_TEXT.KPI_LEAD: Person who is responsible for updating the values of this KPI

WEIGHT.MESSAGE: Weights can be used to increase or decrease the importance of a single Key Result when calculating overall Objective Progress %

MESSAGE.TIME_FRAME_NOT_STARTED: You can't update this key result now. The Time Frame for this key result starts on {{ date }}. Then you'll be able to update it

TOOLTIPS.PROGRESS: This Key result's progress contributes to {{weight}}% of the Objective's progress

PLACEHOLDERS.NAME: Key Result Name. eg. Add Metadata to improve SEO
PLACEHOLDERS.DESCRIPTION: A short description to give some context about the Key Result

HELPER_TEXT.KEY_RESULT_GENERAL: A Key Result is how you plan to measure that you have achieved your objective .
HELPER_TEXT.KEY_RESULT_OWNER: The person responsible for completing the Key Result.
HELPER_TEXT.KEY_RESULT_LEAD: The person responsible for organizing and planning that is needed to achieve the Key Result.

SETTINGS.ACTIVITY_PROOF_DURATION_INFO: Duration of activity proof countdown dialog, it represent an amount of minutes given to prove activity
SETTINGS.ENABLE_DETECTION_INACTIVITY_INFO: Enabled - the system will detect inactivity and display a warning. Disabled - no warning will be displayed when an employee is inactive.
SETTINGS.DELETE_IDLE_TIME_INFO: Enable - the system will delete idle time. Disable - the system will not delete idle time
SETTINGS.ALLOW_SCREEN_CAPTURE_INFO: Enable - the timer will take screenshot. Disable - the timer will run without to take screenshot for all organization members

SETUP.TITLE: 欢迎使用Ever® Gauzy™-开源企业管理平台（ERP/CRM/HRM）
SETUP.LABEL: Gauzy桌面应用程序在您的台式计算机或笔记本电脑上提供Gauzy平台的完整功能。此外，它还可以跟踪工作时间、记录活动，并能够接收跟踪提醒/通知。
SETUP.LABEL_SERVER: Gauzy桌面应用程序在您的台式计算机或笔记本电脑上提供Gauzy平台的完整功能。此外，它还可以跟踪工作时间、记录活动，并能够接收跟踪提醒/通知。
SETUP.SELECT_MULTIPLE_OPTIONS: 您只能选择一个选项或两个选项。
SETUP.SELECT_ONE_OPTION: 您必须只选择下面的一个选项。
SETUP.INSTALL_GP_LOCAL: 在本地计算机上安装和运行Gauzy平台。
SETUP.SEPARATE_SERVER: 连接到工作网络中的独立服务器。
SETUP.CONNECTED_LIVE_SERVER: 连接到我们的在线服务器并将其用作软件即服务。
SETUP.GONNA_USE_3RD_PARTY: 您是否需要第三方集成？
SETUP.SELECT_MULTIPLE_OPTIONS_3RD_PARTY: 这是一个选项，您可以选择一种或两种类型的第三方集成。
SETUP.LEGAL_NOTE: 法律声明：所有产品名称、品牌名称、商标、标识和注册商标均为各自所有者的财产。我们与所提及的第三方公司、品牌、产品、站点或服务无关，也不赞助、支持或支持。提供第三方软件的链接仅作为一种方便和信息目的提供；它们不构成对公司、组织或个人的任何产品、服务或意见的认可或批准。我们只使用相应的徽标和品牌名称来宣传我们的产品使用相应的产品和技术或具有相应服务的内置集成能力。
SETUP.READY_FOR_ADVANCED_SETTINGS: 您是否准备好进行一些高级设置？
SETUP.FINAL_STEP_GP: 这是最后一步，您可以详细了解Gauzy平台。

SETTINGS.SHOW_DESKTOP_NOTIF_SCREEN_CAPTURE: 显示屏幕捕获时的桌面通知
SETTINGS.SHOW_NOTIF_CAPTURED_IMG: 在通知中显示捕获的图像
SETTINGS.SHOW_NATIVE_OS_NOTIF: 显示本机操作系统通知
SETTINGS.PLAY_SOUND: 在屏幕捕获时播放声音
SETTINGS.UPDATE_ACTIVITIES: 每隔一段时间更新活动或屏幕捕获
SETTINGS.TRACK_TIME_PC_LOCKED: 跟踪计算机锁定时的时间
SETTINGS.PREVENT_DISPLAY_GOING_SLEEP: 防止显示器进入休眠状态
SETTINGS.ENABLE_AUTOMATIC_UPDATE_LABEL: 启用自动更新检查，以便运行请求检查新版本是否可用并通知
SETTINGS.SET_UPDATE_INTERVAL_DURATION: 设置更新检查间隔持续时间
SETTINGS.SELECT_DEFAULT_CDN: 选择默认的CDN服务器进行更新
SETTINGS.LOCAL_SERVER_NOTE: 所选目录必须明确包含latest.yml和/或latest-mac.yml清单，以进行更新验证
SETTINGS.CHECK_UPDATE_APP_VERSION: 检查并更新您的应用程序版本

SETTINGS.UPDATE_AVAILABLE_NOTE: 有新版本可用！请点击下方的“立即下载”按钮。

SETTINGS.WARNING_STOP_TIMER: 如果您想更改配置，请先停止计时器。
